successes.title: STACKER - A New Kind of Commercial 3D Printer
successes.description: An affordable commercial-grade 3D printer, offering high print speed, large build volume, and specially designed for composite filaments.

Pledges.description: Every pledge makes a huge difference to a startup. Help us play in the same sandbox with the big boys, and we will list your name on our website as founding backers!

Get our new HYBRID Hot End Kit. Includes one 0.50mm low temp nozzle, one 0.50mm high temp nozzle, complete hot end assembly, wiring connectors, and fittings. Now you can take advantage of our composite filaments, and give your own printer the reliability and performance it deserves. Shipping costs not included.

Be the first to get your new STACKER, 2 head desktop model. Also includes one spool of our incredible new carbon fiber filament. Flat packed to help reduce shipping damage and allow for worldwide delivery, some assembly is required. Your product will ship from our first production run. Shipping costs not included.
